mapper.select: SELECT goodsitem.id tid,goodsitem.categoryid,goodsitem.campaignid,goodsitem.name,goodsitem.imgurl timgurl,goodsitem.price,goodsitem.sale,goodsitem.vendor,goodsritemimg.id iid,goodsritemimg.goodsitemid,goodsritemimg.imgurl iimgurl FROM goodsitem LEFT JOIN goodsritemimg ON goodsitem.id=goodsritemimg.goodsitemid WHERE goodsitem.campaignid=#{campaignid}

SELECT goodsitem.id tid,goodsitem.categoryid,goodsitem.campaignid,goodsitem.name,goodsitem.imgurl timgurl,goodsitem.price,goodsitem.sale,goodsitem.vendor,goodsritemimg.id iid,goodsritemimg.goodsitemid,goodsritemimg.imgurl iimgurl FROM goodsitem LEFT JOIN goodsritemimg ON goodsitem.id=goodsritemimg.goodsitemid WHERE goodsitem.categoryid=#{categoryid}

SELECT goodsitem.id tid,goodsitem.categoryid,goodsitem.campaignid,goodsitem.name,goodsitem.imgurl timgurl,goodsitem.price,goodsitem.sale,goodsitem.vendor,goodsritemimg.id iid,goodsritemimg.goodsitemid,goodsritemimg.imgurl iimgurl FROM goodsitem LEFT JOIN goodsritemimg ON goodsitem.id=goodsritemimg.goodsitemid WHERE goodsitem.id=#{id}

SELECT goodsitem.id tid,goodsitem.categoryid,goodsitem.campaignid,goodsitem.name,goodsitem.imgurl timgurl,goodsitem.price,goodsitem.sale,goodsitem.vendor,goodsritemimg.id iid,goodsritemimg.goodsitemid,goodsritemimg.imgurl iimgurl FROM goodsitem LEFT JOIN goodsritemimg ON goodsitem.id=goodsritemimg.goodsitemid WHERE name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchContent}),'%')

SELECT goodsitem.id tid,goodsitem.categoryid,goodsitem.campaignid,goodsitem.name,goodsitem.imgurl timgurl,goodsitem.price,goodsitem.sale,goodsitem.vendor,IFNULL(goodsritemimg.id iid,-1),goodsritemimg.goodsitemid,goodsritemimg.imgurl iimgurl FROM goodsitem LEFT JOIN goodsritemimg ON goodsitem.id=goodsritemimg.goodsitemid WHERE goodsitem.vendor=#{vendor}
